footers.400: Dogs can't look up... and this request won't work
footers.402: How's that for a slice of fried gold? (Pay up)
footers.403: You're not coming in! Access denied
footers.404: Don't forget to kill Philip (the missing page)
footers.405: We're coming to get you, Barbara! (Wrong method)
footers.406: Big Al says so (Format not supported)
footers.408: Took your sweet time, didn't you?
footers.410: It's gone to join Philip in the garden
footers.429: Calm down, you're acting like a zombie horde
footers.500: Don't stop me now! (Server's having issues)
footers.504: Still waiting... bit like a zombie, really

titles.400: You've Got Bad Data On You

messages.400:
1. Check your request syntax
2. Fix the bad parameters
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.401:
1. Get proper credentials
2. Log in with the right account
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.402:
1. Find your wallet
2. Pay for the premium content
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.403:
1. Request access from admin
2. Wait for permission
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.404:
1. Check if the page moved
2. Try searching for it
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
4. Wait for this to blow over
messages.405:
1. Check the HTTP method
2. Use GET instead of POST (or vice versa)
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.406:
1. Adjust your Accept headers
2. Request a different format
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.408:
1. Check your internet connection
2. Retry the request
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.409:
1. Resolve the data conflict
2. Refresh and try again
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.410:
1. Accept it's gone forever
2. Find an alternative
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.413:
1. Compress your file
2. Split it into smaller chunks
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.429:
1. Slow down your requests
2. Wait a bit
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
4. Wait for this to blow over
messages.500:
1. Wait for server recovery
2. Contact the admin
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
4. Wait for this to blow over
messages.502:
1. Check gateway status
2. Try again later
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.503:
1. Wait for maintenance to finish
2. Come back later
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
4. Wait for this to blow over
messages.504:
1. Check network connectivity
2. Retry the request
3. Have a pint at the Winchester
messages.default:
1. Get a pint at the Winchester
2. Wait for this error to blow over

descriptions.400: You've got bad syntax on you.
descriptions.401: You've got no credentials on you.
descriptions.402: You've got unpaid bills on you.
descriptions.403: You've got no access on you.
descriptions.404: You've got a missing page on you.
descriptions.405: You've got the wrong method on you.
descriptions.406: You've got incompatible formats on you.
descriptions.410: You've got nothing left on you. It's gone.
descriptions.413: You've got too much data on you.
descriptions.429: You've got too many requests on you.
descriptions.500: You've got server failure on you.
descriptions.502: You've got gateway errors on you.
descriptions.504: You've got network lag on you.
descriptions.default: You've got an error on you.
